summary: All four requirements are implemented in the diff. REQ-1 is addressed in ServicesSection.tsx with explicit text-white classes. REQ-2 is addressed in Layout.tsx with always-dark bg-steel-900 header and text-white nav links. REQ-3 is addressed in AboutSection.tsx with text-white headings/labels and text-white/80 body text. REQ-4 is addressed across HeroSection, TestimonialsSection, GallerySection, BookingForm, and ContactSection with bright white text and preserved orange accents. No hallucinated features were detected.
